author: Sully Barrett
title: Coronavirus on campus: College students scramble to solve food insecurity and housing challenges
description: College students search for housing and affordable food as school shutdowns, caused by coronavirus, end meal plans and part-time job income.
content:
As U.S. cases of coronavirus soar, colleges and universities across the country are shutting down to prevent the virus from spreading. For students who can't go home, this poses serious complications.
Northeastern University gave students three days to leave… [+5375 chars]
